articles.author: Ruby Mellen, Laris Karklis
articles.title: Ukraine war: Mapping where Russian troops retreated in Kharkiv - The Washington Post
articles.description: In less than a week, Ukraine’s military made startling gains against Russian forces in the Kharkiv region, potentially changing the tide of a war that has raged for more than half a year and changed the geopolitical fabric of Europe.

articles.title: Ukrainian surge throws Kremlin propagandists into disarray - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Some advocate starting peace talks while others demand retaliation — all as Ukrainian troops advance.

articles.title: Swedish voters boost anti-immigration party amid high crime - CTV News
articles.description: A populist anti-immigration party has surged to become Sweden's second-largest political force after a national election dominated by fears of gang violence, which has given the once-safe Scandinavian country one of Europe's highest levels of gun violence.

articles.title: World leaders scramble for invites to 'a funeral like no other' - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: US President Biden, Japanese Emperor Naruhito and New Zealand Prime Minister Ardern will be among the guests for Queen Elizabeth II’s state funeral on September 19.
